title: ADF Prompt Template Metadata
description: Schema for validating ADF prompt template metadata

id.description: Unique identifier for the prompt template

description.description: Brief description of the prompt's purpose

tags.description: Categorization tags for filtering and organization

max_turn.description: Maximum conversation turn this prompt is designed for (optional)

filepath.description: Relative path to the prompt file from the prompts/adf directory

created_at.description: ISO timestamp when the prompt was created

updated_at.description: ISO timestamp when the prompt was last updated
